mapper.select: SELECT nms.* FROM notify_message_setting nms WHERE nms.`CODE`=#{code} and nms.PROJECT_ID = 0

SELECT DISTINCT nssc.ID, nssc.NAME FROM notify_message_setting nms INNER JOIN notify_send_setting nss ON nms.CODE = nss.CODE LEFT JOIN notify_send_setting_category nssc ON nssc.CODE = nss.CATEGORY_CODE WHERE nms.NOTIFY_TYPE = #{notifyType}

SELECT nms.ID, nms.ENV_ID, nms.NOTIFY_TYPE, nms.CODE, nms.PROJECT_ID, nms.EVENT_NAME, nms.SMS_ENABLE, nms.PM_ENABLE, nms.EMAIL_ENABLE, nms.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, nss.ID AS NSS_ID, nss.NAME, nss.EMAIL_ENABLED_FLAG, nss.PM_ENABLED_FLAG, nss.SMS_ENABLED_FLAG, nt.ID NT_ID, nt.SENDING_TYPE, nssc.ID AS GROUP_ID, nmstu.ID AS NMSTU_ID, nmstu.USER_ID,nmstu.TYPE,nmstu.MESSAGE_SETTING_ID FROM notify_message_setting nms INNER JOIN notify_send_setting nss ON nms.CODE = nss.CODE LEFT JOIN notify_send_setting_category nssc ON nss.CATEGORY_CODE = nssc.CODE LEFT JOIN notify_template nt ON nss.CODE = nt.SEND_SETTING_CODE LEFT JOIN notify_message_setting_target nmstu ON nmstu.MESSAGE_SETTING_ID = nms.ID WHERE nms.NOTIFY_TYPE = #{notifyType} AND nms.PROJECT_ID = 0 AND nss.IS_ENABLED = TRUE

mapper.delete: DELETE nms, nmstu FROM notify_message_setting nms JOIN notify_message_setting_target nmstu ON nmstu.MESSAGE_SETTING_ID = nms.id WHERE nms.NOTIFY_TYPE = #{type} AND nms.ENV_ID = #{envId}
